description_text:
Greetings Simsonn, I wasn’t planning to reach out, I was on my PC today in
the office and came across your website, but after seeing how much effort
you’re putting into growing it, I felt I should share what I saw. You’ve
built something with real potential but it seems some of your investment is
going in the wrong direction, you are spending on what is not important,
reaching people who aren’t your ideal audience.

A small adjustment in focus could make a big difference and reveal the real
value of what you’ve built and BOOM out the result you want.

Mind if I explain what I noticed and how to fix it?

– marvellous
